sentences.sContent: They tested two types of mucilage — a gelatinous substance produced by the cactus — in contaminated water.
sentences.sContent_eng: They tested two types of mucilage — a gelatinous substance produced by the cactus — in contaminated water.
sentences.sCn: 他们在被污染的水中测试了两种粘液——仙人掌分泌的胶状物质。

sentences.sContent: When the trap door shuts, the plant excretes mucilage next to a special cuticle around the door, creating a watertight seal.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the trap door shuts, the plant excretes mucilage next to a special cuticle around the door, creating a watertight seal.
sentences.sCn: 当陷阱阀门关闭的时候，植物在阀门周围的特殊角质层上分泌粘液，形成不透水密封垫。

words.tran: 粘的，[植] 粘液质的；分泌粘液的
